title: Understanding Structure for Individuals with ASD
text: Individuals with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) often benefit from having a structured environment. This can help them feel more secure and reduce anxiety.

title: Types of Structure
text: Consider the different ways structure can be provided in daily life. Think about routines, schedules, and tools that can help organize tasks.

title: Identifying the Right Structure
text: Which of the following is a tool that can help provide structure by organizing tasks and activities?
